decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of  five years from the date of this permission.  REASON:	In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990. | All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building.  REASON:	To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings. | The proposed replacement kitchen window in the rear elevation, is to match exactly the original design, including the size and proportion of window panes, detailing and cross sections of frames and glazing bars.  REASON:  To preserve the character of the Brentham Garden Estate Conservation Area.
description: Alterations to enclose open area thus extending kitchen and replacement window in rear elevation
